name: blue-orb
effect: Causes kyogre to appear in the embedded tower.
short_effect: Summons Kyogre to the Embedded Tower.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A shiny blue orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It’s known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A shiny blue orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It’s known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A shiny blue orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It’s known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
